refbody.section: PurposeWithin an edit session, discard all changes that were made to a configuration object during the edit session or during a nested edit session.
Usage NotesIn a nested edit session, cancel discards only the changes that were made in the edit submode.

ExampleCancel changes that were made during an edit session on the network-settings configuration object. edit network-settings Console network-settings> set tcp-retries 10 Console network-settings> cancel Cancelled
